line_1: "Are these of use for nothing but to sew?
line_2: "These fingers, at whose touch ev'n age wou'd glow,

line_1: Hard is our fate while bliss in hopes we sew,
line_2: Than thus unwise another course pursue;

line_1: Hard is our fate while bliss in hopes we sew,
line_2: Try what I here advance, you'll find it true.

line_1: Hard is our fate while bliss in hopes we sew,
line_2: Contentment sweet, alas, is known to few.
